thread.title: Samuel Belzberg, Relentless Canadian Deal Maker and Philanthropist, Dies at 89

author: James R. Hagerty
title: Samuel Belzberg, Relentless Canadian Deal Maker and Philanthropist, Dies at 89
text:
Samuel Belzberg, a Calgary, Alberta-born investor, made a fortune during the U.S. takeover mania of the 1980s and lost nearly all of it when real-estate prices slumped in the early 1990s. Then, starting over in his early 60s, he doggedly rebuilt his wealth by buying and selling property, a student-loan firm and a charter airline, among other assets.
A relentless deal maker, Mr. Belzberg once threatened to make a hostile takeover bid on Christmas Eve. At the family dinner table in the 1970s, he fired his teenage daughter Wendy...
